content:
My professional dedication
will keep me waiting here for you.

To be honest, I came here because
I received quite an extraordinary work notice,
telling me to wait here for a destined person to help me collect some things.

But don't look down on "trash collecting" —
After all, trash and treasure are just like madness and genius:
They're only a thin line apart.

Here's what we'll do - start by helping me collect grass and branches.
Just gather 5 of them and come back to me.

My companions and I call this activity—
scavenging,
and it looks like you're the destined one I've been waiting for.

Even when picking up trash, you gotta have some professional pride!
Start what you finish,
So come back to me once you've collected 5, okay?
